game.name: Break The Hoops
game.description:
Like many other players, you also have immense love for the tower games. Today we have tried our level best to introduce you a brand new arcade puzzle challenge where you have to control a helix tower. Your primary objective is to break the weak points on the hoop using your mouse. Do you think that you can accept this challenge perfectly? Join Break The Hoops game and prove the world that you have an ultimate command over the jumping and hopping!
Swipe your finger to rotate the hoop and break the weak points on the hoop! When you do this, try to avoid being contacted with the obstacles otherwise you will lose your game in this html5 tower jumper game. Challenge your focus and quick reflexes skills to complete all addictive and engaging 100 levels! It sounds easy to handle this game, but it is hard to be the master of the gameplay. Complexities increase as you progress in the game! Try to use the minimum hoops to set the best score in each level!
The simple and beautiful graphics design of the game combined with easy controls and seamless gameplay can help you get engrossed for hours. Join the world of skill platform game and invite your friends to have fun for free, no download required! Our website features a wide array of classy and easy-to-play arcade puzzle games for kids. You are invited to check out our top jump games to cheer your mood. Good luck to have a blast in the virtual world!!
